update.description:
ported Mesh and SubMesh classes from gazebo.

changes:

- separated them into two files

- pimpl'ized

- used c++11 where possible

- updated doxygen

- removed `Get` from function names. Note that this doesn't work in all cases. Some cause conflict between class names. e.g. `Mesh::GetSkeleton` has to be renamed to `Mesh::MeshSkeleton` because `Mesh::Skeleton` refuses to compile

- added unit tests

- kept original test in `test/integration/mesh.cc`. It needs other classes that are not ported yet so won't compile and so not added to cmake
update.title: Add Mesh and SubMesh classes
